content:
# Światowy Dzień Wody 2024

URL: http://www.unesco.agh.edu.pl/aktualnosci/swiatowy-dzien-wody-2024/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:39:55

World Water Day 2024
2024.03.19, 08h00 – 11h00, AGH University of Krakow. 
UNESCO AGH Chair Seminar. 
UNESCO World Water Day: Water for Peace. 
Organizer: UNESCO AGH Chair. 

The seminar is focusing on the role and importance of water and  promoting the UN Sustainable Development Goals and good practices. The  seminar will be attended by representatives from 16 countries: Benin,  Cuba, Ethiopia, India, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Namibia, Nigeria, Pakistan,  Peru, Poland, Sri Lanka, Syria, Tanzania, Uzbekistan, Zambia. 
More information about event: 
www.unesco.agh.edu.pl

2024.03.21, 10h00 – 14h20, AGH University of Krakow. 
AGH WGGiOŚ Seminar. 
Zjednoczeni dla wody/ United for Water. 
Organizer: AGH WGGiOŚ. 

More information about event: 
www.agh.edu.pl

2024.03.22, from 11h00, University of Lodz (online) 
UNESCO Chair on Ecohydrology and Applied Ecology Seminar 
Water for Peace and Prosperity. 
Organizer: UNESCO Chair on Ecohydrology and Applied Ecology, University  of Lodz.
